title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message:
Looking for a little help tracking down a no backlight issue on a a1502 Macbook Pro with 820-4924 board.  The machine chimes and is booting up and displaying a picture as seen by putting a flashlight behind the apple logo.

Any help on what specifically to start looking at to trace this down would be much appreciated.

title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message: what voltage do you get on pin1 of j8300

title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message: This is absolutely nuts but it reads 51.5v once the laptop is turned on and chimes

title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message: It's not detecting a load, try a known good screen or check lvds cable/connector

title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message: Burned cable or connector. Could also be fried on the LCD side so you don't see if.

title: [SOLVED]A1502 820-4924 no backlight after minor liquid damage
message: Just wanted to follow up with this.  It turns out that the backlight was blown on the LCD side of things.  Replaced and now working normally.
